titleStmt.title: SII 8.4: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 4. (A.R. No. 418 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALLS.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiṅkaḷer malarn=tu veṇkuṭai maṇṭali maṉnuyirtoṟum niṉṟaruḷ curan=tuṉiṟaiṉiḻal parappi ṉiṟpa muṟaimaiyiṟ ceṅkol ticaitoṟuñ cellat taṅkaḷ kulamutaṟ parutiyiṉ valanerpu ṉivaṟku Oṟṟai yāḻi yulāva ṉaṟṟavat tirumalaṟ celviyum Irunilap pāvaiyum kīrt=tiyuṅ kiḷḷaiyum porttanip pūvaiyum matuvaiyiṟ puṇarttu potumai tirttut taṉnurimait teviyarāka mārviṉiṟ cuṭarmaṇi makuṭañ cūṭṭi neṭunila maṉnavar muṟaimuṟai taṉnaṭi vaṇaṅka viramu n=tiyākamum Ārameṉa puṉain=tu virasiṁhāsanattu viṟṟirun=taruḷina māppukaḻ manuvuṭaṉ vaḷartta kopparakecarivanmarāna Uṭaiyār śrīAdhirājentradevaṟku yāṇṭu mūṉṟāvatu nāḷ nūṟṟaṟupattoṉṟiṉāl Atikārikaḷ coḻamaṇṭalattu pāṇṭikulācanivaḷanāṭṭup puṟakkiḷiyūrṉāṭṭup pulāṅkuṭaiyār pūra ṉātittatevanārāṉa rājarājentra muven=taveḷārum se kkoṇṭāṉvaḷanāṭṭut tirai
jaṉ paraniruparākkatanāṉa vīracoḻa Iḷaṅkoveḷānum Eyiṟkoṭṭattu Eyināṭṭu nakaram kāñcipurattut tirumiyānamuṭaiyār koyiliṉ kiḻaimaṇṭapam kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻani lirun=tu tirukkāraikkāṭuṭaiyār tevatānamāṉa Ūrkaḷukku kurakkuk keṭṭu Ittevar tevatāṉamāṉa Ūrkaḷil U mum taṟippuṭavaiyum velikkācum taṇṭalilkaṭamaiyum valaṅkai Iṭaṅkai makaṇmai yuḷḷiṭṭa An=ta rāyattukku Āyirakkalattuvāy Irupattaiñcu kācāka koṇṭuvarukiṟapaṭi cakkaravattikaḷ śrīvīrarājentradevaṟku yāṇṭu Eḻāvatiṉ Etirāmāṇṭu mutal Ittevarkke variyiliṭṭup peṟṟamai .
Digital edition of SII 8.4 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
